title: Refrigerator Smooth Door Handle Kit - Black
description: Refrigerator Smooth Door Handle Kit - Black ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 29 Reviews PartSelect Number PS9494525 Manufacturer Part Number WR12X22183 This kit includes both refrigerator and freezer handles. It is used for replacing refrigerator doors handles

installationInstructions.title: Broken door handle
installationInstructions.content: I'm a 73 year old female but this was easy pezy.  3 screws and it was done. Perfect fit..
